attributes.action: No More Private Buses - Local Authorities Should Run Them
attributes.additional_details:
The private bus companies running buses are running them to suit their profits and shareholders to the detriment of the general public. Local authorities have abrogated their responsibilities to the general public whilst increasing local taxes.

Local authorities should be made to run our bus networks in rural shires.

The Secretary of State For Local Authorities should bring in an act now to enable this..
The quality of life for people in rural areas is going down.
